title: Gilmore Girls Basics
description: Test your knowledge of Stars Hollow!

questions.question: What is the name of the town where the Gilmore girls live?
questions.explanation: Stars Hollow is the charming fictional Connecticut town where Lorelai and Rory live.

questions.question: What is Lorelai's favorite beverage?
questions.explanation: Lorelai is famously obsessed with coffee and can't function without it!

questions.question: Rory is Lorelai's daughter.
questions.explanation: Rory (Lorelai Leigh Gilmore) is Lorelai's daughter, whom she had at age 16.

questions.question: What is the name of the local diner in Stars Hollow?
questions.explanation: Luke's Diner is the beloved local hangout run by Luke Danes, where Lorelai gets her coffee.

questions.question: What elite prep school does Rory attend?
questions.explanation: Rory attends Chilton Preparatory School, funded by her grandparents Emily and Richard.

questions.question: The show originally ran for 7 seasons.
questions.explanation: Gilmore Girls ran for 7 seasons from 2000-2007, plus the 2016 Netflix revival 'A Year in the Life.'

questions.question: What Ivy League school does Rory dream of attending?
questions.explanation: Rory dreams of attending Harvard throughout her childhood, though she ultimately attends Yale.

questions.question: What is the name of Lorelai's parents?
questions.explanation: Richard and Emily Gilmore are Lorelai's wealthy, traditional parents who live in Hartford.
